p:
Linseed oil extraction using organic solvent ( n-hexane) gave a 36.1% yield in 14-hour extraction. Khattab and Zeitoun (
14 ) obtained a 42.4% yield of linseed oil using the same extraction process; however, they did not mention the process extraction time. Table 1 shows the 2 2 experimental design matrix for linseed oil yield using subcritical extraction.
